column4: How do I get Ubuntu (default GNOME desktop) to use a USB audio device by default instead of the onboard audio?
OK, if I change the settings in System/Preferences/Sound, will I bypass PulseAudio?  I know PulseAudio is widely disliked, but I assume it's there for a reason.
Yep - change the settings to ALSA
Because PulseAudio is the default. Change it.
